title: Espresso Martini Cocktail
directions: Combine espresso, vodka, coffee liqueur, creme de cacao, and ice in a cocktail shaker. Cover and shake until chilled. Strain into a chilled martini glass.
ingredients: 1 1/2 fluid ounces coffee-flavored liqueur (such as Kahlua)
1 fluid ounce white creme de cacao
